## Raw to clean

## Loading packages

```{r}
if(!require("tidyverse")) install.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
```

## Loading raw data

```{r}
raw_data <- read.csv("pilotresults.csv")
```

## Cleaning/filtering data

```{r}


#Filtering columns
raw_data_filtered = raw_data %>% 
  select(-trial_type,
         -trial_index,
         -plugin_version,
         -success,
         -question_order,
         -slider_start,
         -stimulus,
         -time_elapsed)

raw_data_filtered = raw_data_filtered %>% 
   filter(response == "n" | response == "j" | response == "f" | response == "g" | task == "probe")


#Filtering stimuli
raw_data_filtered = raw_data_filtered %>%
  mutate(
    correct = factor(recode(correct,
                             "true" = "1",
                             "false" = "0")))
```
